text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The response explicitly addresses how to justify the requested provisions to the founders by stating: \"Frame everything as mutual protection: Vesting protects founders from each other; ROFR protects everyone from unwanted third parties; Consent rights protect the company from hasty decisions; Liquidation preference simply ensures capital recovery before profit sharing.\" This directly satisfies the criterion requiring the response to state that one justification method is to claim the provisions protect all parties involved (shareholders, founders, equity employees).", "criterion_id": "f1c2a174-604b-4677-be71-ea5f85e43f60"}
